label: 大嘗会
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: (alt. Daijôsai 大嘗祭) the Great Festival of Enthronement—rites celebrating a new royal reign, which were generally held in the autumn within a year of a new monarch’s accession.
